Comment: On the theory of "we've tried everything else against her."
Strong and natural, forcing the Queen to move again.
The alternative move is 3... Q-QR4, but this seemed safer.
A natural reply, stopping P-Q5 and opening a line for the KB to develop.
T. M. was shocked at this move. I remember him poking me with his elbow, as if to say, "I can't believe she made a mistake!"
T. M. snags the loose Pawn. What he missed was...
Checking the King and attacking the Queen. T. M. looked disgusted as he resigned... not that he lost to her, but that it happened so darn fast!
